_header: Sith ye have me challenged Master Garnesche
_description: John Skelton, Against Garnesche, a flytyng — 469 lines in rhyme royal stanzas, couplets, and ‘Skeltonics’

BLHar367.First Lines:
Sithe ye haue me chalyngyd m garnescheIn duly Reulyng me In þe
                    kynges noble hall…
BLHar367.Last Lines:
…Scrybbyl thow scrybbyl thow rayle or
                    wryghtwryght what thow wylte I wyll the a
                    quyte
BLHar367.Note:
Below last line, scribe writes, ‘By þe kyngys most noble
                    Commandement’ (f. 109v)
BLHar367.Attributed Title:
Skelton lauriate defender agenst Master garnesche Chalenger et cetera (top
                    f. 101, by scribe)
